oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Poster of "Centralia Cavalry Company," an Illinois unit that served in Missouri and Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1st Ill. Cav. Regt., according to the poster, "bushwhacked and jayhawked" across southeast Missouri. Poster shows regiment's encampment at Memphis, Tenn. One of unit's corporals was G. W. Garber, an alias of David P. Sherfy of Jonesborough, Tenn.
